skill_constraints: Single DevOps engineer is a major bottleneck and risk for the first 4-6 weeks.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize all DevOps tasks first; allow application developers to work against local Docker environment.

skill_constraints: Onboarding overhead for the new team member for the first sprint.
resource_bottlenecks: QA availability for E2E testing of parallel features.
mitigation_strategies: Pair the new DevOps engineer with the existing one to accelerate infrastructure and CI/CD setup.
